name: electron-hello-world
description: Simple Electron boilerplate showing a Hello World window

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc -p tsconfig.json && tsc -p tsconfig.renderer.json && mkdir -p dist/assets dist/server && cp index.html dist/index.html && cp styles.css dist/styles.css && cp assets/icon.png dist/assets/icon.png && cp -R server dist/server
